prop.select_size_tt: size of the selection rectangle used to select and drag the object
prop.nonzero_value_tt: value to output when the toggle shows an 'x'
prop.flash_interrupt_tt: the amount of time (in milliseconds) that Pd will wait before interrupting the flashing of the button
prop.flash_hold_tt: the amount of time (in milliseconds) that Pd will display the flash animation
prop.vu_scale_tt: display scale (numbers) next to the meter
prop.width_tt: width of the iemgui in pixels
prop.height_tt: height of the iemgui in pixels
prop.minimum_tt: smallest number to output. Anything lower will be replaced by this number
prop.maximum_tt: largest number to output. Anything bigger will be replaced by this number
prop.init_tt: save the state of the iemgui with the patch, and output a saved value when loaded (as if you had a [loadbang] connected to the input)
prop.log_scale_tt: use logarithmic scale for values along the slider
prop.log_height_tt: the framus intersects with the ramistan approximately at the podernoster
prop.steady_tt: don't move the slider when clicked. Only move it when dragging the mouse
prop.drawstyle_tt: adjust number frame style by toggling its elements
prop.send_tt: symbol to send wireless messages to other iemguis or objects
prop.receive_tt: symbol to receive wireless messages from other iemguis or objects
prop.label: text
prop.label_tt: text to display next to this iemgui
prop.xoffset_tt: horizontal offset of the text relative to the top-left corner of the iemgui
prop.yoffset_tt: vertical offset for the text relative to the top-left corner of the iemgui
prop.font_tt: which font to use when displaying the label text
prop.fontsize_tt: size of the font for the label
prop.bgcolor_tt: background fill color for the iemgui
prop.ok_tt: Apply the settings and close this dialog window
prop.apply_tt: Apply the settings without closing the dialog
prop.mknob_steps_tt: number of dial positions for the knob

prop.label: label
prop.label_tt: text label to display next to this object
prop.labelpos_tt: position the text label relative to the widget
prop.dropdown_outtype_tt: whether to output the index or the value

menu.open_tt: Open one or more Pd files
menu.recent_files_tt: Open a recently opened Pd file
menu.k12_demos_tt: Demo patches for use with K12 Mode
menu.save_tt: Save a Pd patch to disk
menu.saveas_tt: Save a Pd patch by manually choosing a filename
menu.print_tt: Print a Pd patch, saving the result to a PDF file
menu.message_tt: Send a message directly to the running Pd instance
menu.quit_tt: Close all patches and quit the program
menu.undo_tt: Undo the last action performed on this patch
menu.redo_tt: if you clicked undo, this will restore the action that you performed
menu.cut_tt: Remove the currently selected object or objects on the canvas
menu.copy_tt: Copy selected objects to the clipboard
menu.paste_tt: Add any objects to the canvas which were previously cut or copied
menu.paste_clipboard_tt: Paste Pd code from the clipboard to the canvas (use with caution!)
menu.duplicate_tt: Paste a copy of the current selection on the canvas (doesn't use clipboard)
menu.selectall_tt: Select all objects in a patch
menu.find_tt: Find text in the console output
menu.encapsulate_tt: Encapsulate automatically the current selection into a subpatch
menu.tidyup_tt: Line up the selected objects in straight rows and columns
menu.tofront_tt: Bring the selected object visually in front of all other objects
menu.toback_tt: Send the selected object visually behind all other objects
menu.font_tt: Font size settings for this patch
menu.cordinspector_tt: Move the mouse over cords to inspect the data moving between objects
menu.find_tt: Search for an object in this patch
menu.findagain_tt: Search for the next object matching the string you typed
menu.finderror_tt: If possible, find the last object which caused an error
menu.autotips_tt: Turn on tooltips in the patch
menu.preferences_tt: Open a dialog window to configure the running instance of Pd
menu.zoomreset_tt: Reset the zoom to the original level
menu.zoomoptimal_tt: Change the zoom to the optimal level which makes the entire patch visible (as far as possible)
menu.zoomhoriz_tt: Change the zoom level to make the patch fit horizontally
menu.zoomvert_tt: Change the zoom level to make the patch fit vertically
menu.object_tt: Add an empty object box to the canvas
menu.msg_tt: Add a message box to the canvas
menu.number_tt: Add a box to type, scroll, and display a number on the canvas
menu.symbol_tt: Add a box to type and display a symbol on the canvas
menu.comment_tt: Write a comment on the canvas
menu.bang_tt: Add a graphical button to the canvas for sending bang messages
Add a graphical checkbox to the canvas for toggling between two values
menu.number2_tt: Add a fancy graphical box to the canvas for displaying and scrolling numbers
menu.vslider_tt: Add a vertical slider to the canvas for scrolling numbers
menu.hslider_tt: Add a horizontal slider to the canvas for scrolling numbers
menu.vradio_tt: Add a vertical group of radio buttons to the canvas for selecting a value
menu.hradio_tt: Add horizontal group of radio buttons to the canvas for selecting a value
menu.vu_tt: Add a VU Meter to the canvas
menu.cnv_tt: Add a boring rectangle to the canvas for displaying a rectangle
menu.graph_tt: Add an empty graph to the canvas
menu.array_tt: Add a visual array object to the canvas (with dialog for settings)
menu.nextwin_tt: Give focus to the next open window in the stacking order
menu.prevwin_tt: Give focus to the previous window in the stacking order
menu.parentwin_tt: give focus to the parent window of the current window
menu.visible_ancestor_tt: give focus to the closest ancestor of this window that is currently visible
menu.pdwin_tt: Give focus to the main Pd window
menu.test_tt: Open a patch to test your audio and midi are configured and functioning correctly
menu.loadmeter_tt: Open a patch to monitor the CPU load of Pd (note: doesn't include the GUI)
menu.about_tt: Get information about this version of Pd
menu.manual_tt: Open the HTML manual for Pd
menu.browser_tt: Open a help browser to search for documentation and objects
menu.intro_tt: Open a help patch listing Pd's most essential objects
menu.l2ork_list_tt: Open a link in a browser for Pd-L2ork Mailing List
menu.pd_list_tt: Open a link in a browser for Pure Data Mailing Lists
menu.forums_tt: Open a link in a browser for the Pd Forum
menu.irc_tt: Open a link in a browser for IRC Chat

canvas.paste_clipboard_prompt: Warning: you are about to paste Pd code that came from somewhere outside of Pd. Do you want to continue?

save_dialog.prompt: Do you want to save the changes you made in
save_dialog.yes_tt: Write the changes to file before closing the patch
save_dialog.no_tt: Don't save any changes, just close the patch
save_dialog.cancel_tt: Don't save any changes, and don't close the patch

abstract_dialog.prompt:
Would you like to turn the identical subpatches into abstractions?
Candidates found in the subpatch tree, from root canvas:
abstract_dialog.note: Note: this can't be undone all at once – any changes made in subpatches can be undone from that subpatch
abstract_dialog.single_tt: Replace the subpatch you just saved with the corresponding abstraction
abstract_dialog.all_tt: Replace all subpatches in the subpatch tree identical to the one you just saved with the corresponding abstraction

warning.unsaved_tt: There is an unsaved edited instance of this abstraction
warning.multipleunsaved_tt: There is another unsaved edited instance of this abstraction

prop.gop_tt: show the inner contents of this canvas in a rectangle on the containing canvas
prop.hide_name_tt: hide the text that appears in the object box
prop.x_margin_tt: horizontal offset into the subpatch for the view area
prop.y_margin_tt: vertical offset into the subpatch for the view area
prop.x1_tt: x value at left edge of graph. (Set automatically for arrays)
prop.x2_tt: x value at right edge of graph. (Set automatically for arrays)
prop.y1_tt: y value at the top of the graph
prop.y2_tt: y value at the bottom of the graph
prop.array_size_tt: number of elements in the array
prop.array_polygon_tt: the array trace is drawn as a polygon
prop.array_points_tt: the array trace is drawn as horizontal line segments
prop.array_bezier_tt: the array trace is drawn as a Bezier curve
prop.array_bars_tt: each element of the array is drawn as a bar in a bar graph
prop.array_save_tt: save array contents with this patch
prop.array_jump_tt: update the element to the position of the click
prop.array_outline_tt: color for outline around the bars
prop.array_in_existing_graph_tt: draw the array inside the last graph that was created. This is a way to have multiple arrays drawn in the same graph.
prop.array_delete_tt: delete this array (i.e., remove it from the graph) when you click Ok

startup.flags_tt: Startup flags the program is invoked with; changes require a restart of the application to take effect
startup.libs_tt: External libraries to be loaded on startup; changes require a restart of the application to take effect
startup.paths_tt: Search path for abstractions and externals
startup.new_tt: Add an item after the selected one

gui.autopatch_yoffset_tt: specify a distance in pixels from the bottom of the object to which the new object will be connected
gui.autopatch_yoffset_checkbox_tt: check to enable a custom autopatching y-offset

presets.gui_preset_tt: Collection of patch colors and styles

grid.show_grid_tt: Snap to the grid in edit mode

zoom.save_zoom_tt: Save the current zoom level with the patch and restore it when reloading the patch

autocomplete.autocomplete_tt: Offers completions for object names and arguments as you type
autocomplete.autocomplete_prefix: match completions by object name prefix
autocomplete.autocomplete_prefix_tt: Only list completions whose prefix matches (rather than matches anywhere in object names)

browser.browser_title: Help browser settings (WARNING: changing these may affect startup times!)
browser.browser_doc: help browser only searches the doc folder
browser.browser_doc_tt: Only scan help patches in the doc folder for searchable keywords (faster)
browser.browser_path: help browser also searches the help path
browser.browser_path_tt: Also scan help patches in the user-defined help path for searchable keywords (slower)
browser.browser_init: prepare the help index at application start
browser.browser_init_tt: If checked, prepare the index for the help browser already when the application starts

audio.api_tt: audio backend or server to use to process audio
audio.blocksize_tt: number of samples in a block to be delivered to or received from the audio api
audio.callback_tt: use Pd's callback interface for this API
audio.channels_tt: number of channels for this device
audio.input_title_tt: hardware devices used to get audio into Pd
audio.output_title_tt: hardware devices to send audio from Pd

midi.api_tt: midi backend or server used to communicate with midi devices
midi.alsa_in_ports_tt: maximum number of incoming midi port connections
midi.alsa_out_ports_tt: maximum number of outgoing midi ports from Pd
midi.input_title_tt: hardware devices used to get midi data into Pd
midi.output_title_tt: hardware devices to send midi data from Pd

prefs.ok_tt: Update the preferences and close the dialog
prefs.apply_tt: Update preferences without closing this dialog

abstractions.selectall_tt: Select all definitions with zero instances
